item.text: Therefore, since we have this ministry, just as God has shown us mercy, we do not become discouraged.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> we have <st data-num="550" class="">rejected</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="152" class="">shameful</st> <st data-num="2927" class="">hidden deeds</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">behaving</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3834" class="">deceptiveness</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1389" class="">distorting</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> by <st data-num="5321">open proclamation</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> we <st data-num="4921" class="">commend</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3956">everyone’s</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2572" class="">veiled</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2572" class="">veiled</st> only <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> those who are <st data-num="622" class="">perishing</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="2316" class="">god</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> has <st data-num="5186" class="">blinded</st> the <st data-num="3540" class="">minds</st> of those who do <st data-num="571">not believe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">so</st> they would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="826" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="5462" class="">light</st> of the <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaim</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> as <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st> as <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">sake</st>.
For God, who said “Let light shine out of darkness,” is the one who shined in our hearts to give us the light of the glorious knowledge of God in the face of Christ.
But we have this treasure in clay jars, so that the extraordinary power belongs to God and does not come from us.

We are <st data-num="2346">experiencing trouble</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> side,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4729" class="">crushed;</st> we are <st data-num="639" class="">perplexed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1820">driven to despair</st>;

we are <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1459" class="">abandoned;</st><n id="1" /> we are <st data-num="2598">knocked down</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st>,

<st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="4064">carrying around</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> our <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> the <st data-num="3500" class="">death</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> may <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> be <st data-num="5319">made visible</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> who are <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st> are <st data-num="104" class="">constantly</st> being <st data-num="3860" class="">handed over</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="1223">sake</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> may also be <st data-num="5319" class="">made visible</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2349" class="">mortal</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5620">As a result</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> is at <st data-num="1754" class="">work</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> is at work <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="2" />
But since we have the same spirit of faith as that shown in what has been written, “I believed; therefore I spoke,” we also believe, therefore we also speak.

We do so<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the one who <st data-num="1453" class="">raised up</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1453">up</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3936" class="">bring</st> us <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> into his presence.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956">all these things</st> are <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1223">sake</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> that is <st data-num="4121">including<n id="1" /> more</st> and <st data-num="4183">more</st> people may cause <st data-num="2169" class="">thanksgiving</st> to <st data-num="4052" class="">increase</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> we do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1573" class="">despair</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1854">physical body</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="1311">wearing away</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2080" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="3" /> is being <st data-num="341" class="">renewed</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3910" class="">momentary</st>, <st data-num="1645" class="">light</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2716" class="">producing</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> an <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="922" class="">weight</st> of <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="5236" class="">far beyond</st> all <st data-num="5236" class="">comparison</st>
because we are not looking at what can be seen but at what cannot be seen. For what can be seen is temporary, but what cannot be seen is eternal.
